UI.noInput: Please answer before viewing the solution

question: Jamal is trying to explain the difference between reach and frequency to his classmates. Which of the following best describes reach?

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. Impact refers to how quickly members of the audience receive an advertising message.

answers.text: Estimated number of times a potential customer will see an advertisement

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. Frequency refers to the number of times a person is exposed to an advertisement or the number of times the advertisement is repeated within a given period of time.

answers.text: How quickly the audience will be reached with an advertisement

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. Engagement refers to any interaction with advertising content.

answers.text: Estimated number of potential customers to see an advertisement

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: Reach refers to the estimated number of potential customers that can be reached with an advertising campaign.

detailedSolution: Reach refers to the estimated number of potential customers that can be reached with an advertising campaign.
